article_title: Here Is What '60 Minutes' Didn't Tell You About The Billionaire Who Is Trying To Disrupt Cancer Care

article_metadata.author: Matthew Herper

og.description: CBS’ fabled newsmagazine show “60 Minutes” just spent 12 minutes showing viewers everything there is to love about Patrick Soon-Shiong, the doctor who is the richest man in L.A. and, actually, the richest physician in the world. As I wrote in a Forbes cover story in September, Soon-Shiong is rolling out [...]
